name: Firehawk: Blades of Freedom
description:
Firehawk: Blades of Freedom is a top down twin-stick shooter in the vein of old school PC games. Cruise through the unfriendly skies and shoot everyone you meet!

This is an alpha release: some features and content are missing, and sometimes the AI can be a little cranky. But hey, you can win or lose, and that's what makes a game, right?

Don't forget to check Help and Options for the controls! The game supports both KB+M and controller.
